item.title: Bar Plot
item.description: Here we can see how to make ourown Bar Plot! First step is to install all the pakages: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) In this example we will look at the team homerun totals for all the MLB teams in 1980: query<-"SELECT name,HR FROM Teams WHERE yearID=1980 ORDER BY HR" result<-sqldf(query) result$name<-factor(result$name,levels=result$name) To make an bar plot, we have to use this command! But aslo we can play with sizes of bins and otehr colors!
